description.name: pyusdsol
description.tagline: PYUSD Solana Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto sol-pyusd Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept PYUSD Solana directly on your website
Unique sol/pyusd receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your sol/pyusd wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
